metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44483 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: All versions of Apache Santuario - XML Security for Java prior to 2.2.6,2.3.4, and 3.0.3, when using the JSR 105 API, are vulnerable to an issuewhere a private key may be disclosed in log files when generating an XMLSignature and logging with debug level is enabled. Users are recommended toupgrade to version 2.2.6, 2.3.4, or 3.0.3, which fixes this issue.

criterions.comment: libxml-security-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
